snippet: The new, global electronic marketplace is rapidly depleting authors’ income streams.
abstract: Op-Ed article by lawyer and author Scott Turow warns Supreme Court decision to allow importation and resale of foreign editions of American works will harm American authors; notes new, global electronic marketplace is rapidly depleting authors' income streams.
lead_paragraph: The new, global electronic marketplace is rapidly depleting authors’ income streams.

headline.main: The Slow Death of the American Author
headline.print_headline: The Slow Death of the American Author
